Name: Almanac
Description: On your turn, you may look at the top card of the Artifact deck.

Name: Audit log
Description: Once per turn, you may look at one opponent's Contract card.

Name: Cup of java
Description: At the beginning of each Preparation phase, you may discard 1 card and draw 1 card.

Name: Geo-scanner
Description: You may always look at the top Landscape card below you.

Name: Inspector's Badge
Description: Once per turn, you may look at one opponent's Artifacts

Name: Lucky Coin
Description: Once per turn, when you draw an Artifact, you may look at it, return it to the bottom of the deck, and draw the next one.

Name: Shop Keys
Description: Once per turn, you may shuffle the 3 face-up Action cards into the deck, and draw 3 new face-up cards.
